SELECT MS_SI_KAMOKU.MS_SI_KAMOKU_ID,
MS_SI_KAMOKU.MS_KAMOKU_ID,
MS_SI_KAMOKU.KAMOKU_NAME, MS_SI_KAMOKU.TAX_FLAG, MS_SI_KAMOKU.HIYOU_KIND,
MS_SI_KAMOKU.DELETE_FLAG, MS_SI_KAMOKU.SEND_FLAG, MS_SI_KAMOKU.VESSEL_ID, MS_SI_KAMOKU.DATA_NO, MS_SI_KAMOKU.USER_KEY, MS_SI_KAMOKU.RENEW_DATE, MS_SI_KAMOKU.RENEW_USER_ID, MS_SI_KAMOKU.TS,
MS_KAMOKU.KAMOKU_NAME AS MS_KAMOKU_NAME, MS_KAMOKU.UTIWAKE_KAMOKU_NAME AS MS_UTIWAKE_KAMOKU_NAME
FROM MS_SI_KAMOKU
LEFT JOIN MS_KAMOKU ON MS_KAMOKU.MS_KAMOKU_ID = MS_SI_KAMOKU.MS_KAMOKU_ID
WHERE MS_SI_KAMOKU.DELETE_FLAG = 0

INSERT INTO MS_SI_KAMOKU( MS_SI_KAMOKU_ID ,
MS_KAMOKU_ID ,
KAMOKU_NAME , TAX_FLAG , HIYOU_KIND ,
DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( nextval('SEQ_MS_SI_KAMOKU_ID') ,
:MS_KAMOKU_ID ,
:KAMOKU_NAME , :TAX_FLAG , :HIYOU_KIND ,
:DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE MS_SI_KAMOKU SET MS_KAMOKU_ID = :MS_KAMOKU_ID ,
KAMOKU_NAME = :KAMOKU_NAME , TAX_FLAG = :TAX_FLAG , HIYOU_KIND = :HIYOU_KIND ,
DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE MS_SI_KAMOKU_ID = :MS_SI_KAMOKU_ID AND TS = :TS
